heroHeading: Beautiful, flexible space for your next event.
heroBody: Host showers, birthday parties, meetings, repasts, and more at WellBridge Social. Two rooms, simple pricing, and a welcoming atmosphere.
heroCallout: Call or text 205-504-6812 to get started.
welcomeParagraph1: WellBridge Social is a locally owned event and conference venue in Birmingham, AL, operated by Lynn Wilkerson. Our goal is to make hosting your event simple, affordable, and stress-free.
welcomeParagraph2: With two flexible spaces, included tables and chairs, and optional linen rentals, you can style the room to match your colors and theme. Bring your own planner, caterer, DJ, and décor—or keep it simple and intimate.
venueDetail1: Located at 1633 Forestdale Blvd, Birmingham, AL
venueDetail2: Large room for up to 100 guests
venueDetail3: Small room for up to 50 guests
venueDetail4: Tables & chairs included with all rentals
venueDetail5: Optional linen and specialty cloths available
eventsBody: Gallery coming soon as we add photos from upcoming events.
rentalsIntro: Clear pricing for both the large and small rooms. Pricing is based on room size, event type, day of the week, time needed, number of guests, linen rental, and whether alcohol will be served.
rentalsBanner: All rentals are for up to 8 hours. Additional time is $100 per hour. Events must end on time; setup and cleanup are included in your 8-hour window.
cleanUpBody: A refundable $100 clean up deposit is required before your event. It will be returned if the venue is left clean and in good condition.
tablesBody: Tables and chairs are included with all rentals. Linen and specialty cloths are available for an additional fee.
alcoholBody: If you have more than 50 guests and serve alcohol (BYOB or open bar), the City of Adamsville requires a police officer on site. To arrange and pay for an officer, please contact the City of Adamsville at 205-674-5671.
planIntro: We keep the process simple so you can focus on celebrating.
step1Body: Send your preferred date, time frame, and guest count.
step2Body: Secure your date with a 50% deposit and a signed agreement.
step3Body: Decorate and host your event the way you imagined it.
faqsIntro: Answers to a few common questions about renting the venue.
faq1Question: Can I bring my own food and cake?
faq1Answer: Yes. You’re welcome to bring your own food, cake, and non-alcoholic drinks, or use the caterer of your choice.
faq2Question: Can I bring a DJ and loud music?
faq2Answer: Yes, DJs are allowed. We just ask that music volume remains respectful of our neighbors.
faq3Answer: Absolutely. Contact us to schedule a tour and see the space in person.
faq4Answer: We do not provide full décor services, but we can recommend decorators and planners who know the space well.
howParagraph1: WellBridge Social was created by Lynn Wilkerson as a warm, flexible gathering space for families and organizations in Birmingham.
howParagraph2: From baby showers to repasts, Lynn’s goal is for every guest to feel welcome and every event to feel cared for.
commitment4: A venue that feels like “yours” for the day
contactIntro: Ready to check a date or ask a question? Reach out below.
contactNote: Please include your date and estimated guest count for a quicker response.
contactCallOrText: Prefer to call or text directly? Call or text 205-504-6812.
